  1. import django
  2. from django.conf import settings
  3. from django.template import Library
  4. from distutils.version import LooseVersion
  6. register = Library()
  8. def filer_actions(context):
  9. """
  10. Track the number of times the action field has been rendered on the page,
  11. so we know which value to use.
  12. """
  13. context['action_index'] = context.get('action_index', -1) + 1
  14. return context
  15. filer_actions = register.inclusion_tag("admin/filer/actions.html", takes_context=True)(filer_actions)
  18. # Shamelessly taken from django-cms
  19. # This will go away when django < 1.4 compatibility will be dropped
  20. if LooseVersion(django.get_version()) < LooseVersion('1.4'):
  21. ADMIN_ICON_BASE = "%sadmin/img/admin/" % settings.STATIC_URL
  22. ADMIN_CSS_BASE = "%sadmin/css/" % settings.STATIC_URL
  23. ADMIN_JS_BASE = "%sadmin/js/" % settings.STATIC_URL
  24. else:
  25. ADMIN_ICON_BASE = "%sadmin/img/" % settings.STATIC_URL
  26. ADMIN_CSS_BASE = "%sadmin/css/" % settings.STATIC_URL
  27. ADMIN_JS_BASE = "%sadmin/js/" % settings.STATIC_URL
  29. @register.simple_tag
  30. def admin_icon_base():
  31. return ADMIN_ICON_BASE
  33. @register.simple_tag

  35. return ADMIN_CSS_BASE
  37. @register.simple_tag

  39. return ADMIN_JS_BASE
